author: Prakash Kamat
text:
Pop star Remo Fernandes on Thursday evening moved the Goa Children’s Court, seeking anticipatory bail in a case related to verbally abusing a teenage girl. The hearing of the same has been fixed for Friday. The singer is facing an FIR for allegedly verbally abusing a 17-year-old girl from Malvan in Maharashtra who was knocked down by a car driven by his son Jonah in north Goa on December 2. Mr. Fernandes was also travelling in the car.

Mr. Fernandes on Wednesday filed an intervention petition in the court through his lawyer.
title: Remo moves Children’s Court for bail
